data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Germann, Christoph, Borovec, Roman, Braunert, Carlo (2015): Four new Entiminae from the Mediterranean region (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae: Phyllobiini, Trachyphloeini), with additional data on the distribution of some poorly known species. Zootaxa 4040 (3): 345-358, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4040.3.6
